<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFECTIVE EQUIPMENT,
UNDER THE TERMS SET FORTH ABOVE, UPON WHICH SERVICES WERE PERFORMED.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">GENERAL</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">This Agreement represents the entire understanding
of the parties as to its subject matter and its terms may not be modified or
amended other than by a writing of even or subsequent date executed for both
parties by their duly authorized representatives.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">Neither an express waiver nor a failure by either
party to demand performance of any provision of this Agreement will constitute
a waiver of such provision at any time in the future or a waiver of any other
provision.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">Any provision of this Agreement which may be
determined by competent authority to be prohibited or unenforceable in any
jurisdiction shall, as to such jurisdiction, be ineffective to the extent of
such prohibition or unenforceability without invalidating the remaining
provisions hereof, and any such prohibition or unenforceability in any
jurisdiction shall not invalidate or render unenforceable such provision in any
other jurisdiction.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">This Agreement shall be governed by and construed
in accordance with the laws of the state of Georgia, regardless of its
conflicts of laws rules.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to
the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and
assigns.&#160; No third party is intended to
benefit from, nor may any third party seek to enforce, any of the provisions of
this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">This Agreement may be executed in one or more
counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original and all of which, taken
together, shall constitute a single enforceable agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">8.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">If Delta initiates an action by way of a claim or
counterclaim to collect any amounts owed under this Agreement, it shall be
entitled to receive its court costs and reasonable attorneys fees and expenses
from Hawaiian.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">9.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">DELTA - PROVIDED INVENTORY</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]&#160;
Hawaiian will provide adequate warehousing and storage space for
Components delivered to Hawaiian by Delta.&#160;
Hawaiian shall at all times store all Components in a segregated area
and identify them as Delta&#146;s inventory, subject to a lien in favor of the
financing party, until installed on an Aircraft.&#160; Hawaiian will use the same degree of care, but in no event less
than reasonable care, in keeping records of and </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">maintaining security for
Delta&#146;s inventory as Hawaiian uses with respect to its own inventory.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Hawaiian will pay all personal
property Taxes on all Components to the extent assessed on Components while in
Hawaiian&#146;s possession.&#160; If Delta
receives any assessment on Components for periods while such Components were in
Hawaiian&#146;s possession, Delta will promptly provide a copy of such assessment to
Hawaiian, together with a calculation showing the amount Delta believes is
allocable to Hawaiian.&#160; Hawaiian will
pay or reimburse Delta for such amount promptly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Except as provided in Section 4.4,
title to Components will remain with Delta at all times.&#160; In the event of any loss, theft, damage or
destruction of any Components while in Hawaiian&#146;s possession or under
Hawaiian&#146;s control which is not recoverable through insurance, Hawaiian will
pay Delta for such Component as provided in Section 19.3 of Annex A.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Hawaiian will keep Delta inventory
Components in Hawaiian&#146;s possession or control free and clear of all liens and
encumbrances arising through Hawaiian or out of or in connection with
Hawaiian&#146;s possession thereof.&#160; If
Hawaiian or any creditor of Hawaiian seeks to, or does, encumber any of the Components
in any way, Delta may demand that Hawaiian unencumber such Components
immediately and Hawaiian will immediately unencumber such Components.&#160; If Hawaiian fails to do so, Delta may
immediately terminate this Agreement pursuant to Section 2.2.&#160; Hawaiian will cooperate in all efforts by
Delta to notify third parties that the Components are the property of Delta,
including in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.5.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Hawaiian and Delta will jointly
prepare a written report, no less than quarterly, listing the item and quantity
of each Component in Hawaiian&#146;s possession or control. Any inventory
discrepancies will be promptly addressed and reconciled by both parties.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Delta and its representatives [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
may, at all times during the Term, enter Hawaiian&#146;s facilities, whether owned
or leased, to inspect any or all Components and related records, including
Hawaiian&#146;s computer systems, to review all records of location, condition and
disposition thereof, and to verify Hawaiian&#146;s compliance with the terms
hereof.&#160; Except during a period when
Hawaiian has been notified by Delta that it is in default hereunder, all such
inspections shall be during normal business hours upon reasonable notice to
Hawaiian.&#160; Hawaiian will assist Delta
with all ongoing or occasional inventory audits Delta may undertake and assist
to reconcile any and all inventory discrepancies.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">9.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Upon expiration or termination of
this Agreement for any reason or upon default by Hawaiian that is not cured
within the time allowed therefor, Hawaiian shall purchase those Components or
equivalents that Delta has purchased for the support of Aircraft in accordance
with Annex A, Section 19.3 of this Agreement.&#160;
</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">All
such Components which are then in Delta&#146;s possession, shall be provided to Hawaiian
as agreed by the parties no later than ten (10) business days after payment, in
accordance with Annex A, Section 19.3, for such Components is received by
Delta.&#160; All other Components must be
returned by Hawaiian to Delta in accordance with Delta&#146;s instructions.&#160; If Hawaiian does not purchase or return all
the Components as required, Delta may enter onto Hawaiian&#146;s premises, whether
leased or owned, and segregate, pack and remove such Components from such
premises.&#160; </font>The cost of shipment,
insurance, duties and other costs, if any, incurred in connection with any such
return or recovery will be borne by Hawaiian, and Hawaiian will promptly pay or
reimburse Delta for the cost thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; CONFIDENTIALITY</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The parties hereto each agree that the
terms of this Agreement is confidential and neither party shall disclose the
terms of this Agreement to any third party without the prior written consent of
the other party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All data exchanged between the parties
pursuant to this Agreement and marked as confidential or proprietary (in the
case of data exchanged orally and expressly stated as confidential which is
followed up in writing within thirty (30) days of such disclosure) shall be
considered Confidential Information. Each party hereto agrees to keep Confidential
Information provided to it by the other party in confidence and not to disclose
such Confidential Information to any third parties or to any person within the
employ of the receiving party without a need to know such information, without
the prior written consent of the disclosing party, such consent not to be
unreasonably withheld. Each party agrees to exercise the same degree of care in
protecting the other party&#146;s Confidential Information as it uses to protect its
own Confidential Information, but in any event, a reasonable degree of
care.&#160; Each party agrees that at the
earlier of termination of this Agreement or upon a request by the other party
for the return of any Confidential Information, it shall, as soon as practical,
return such Confidential Information, or destroy such Confidential Information
and certify such destruction to the disclosing party unless such information is
required by Delta to perform its obligations under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">11.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:.25pt;">NOTICES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Notices
required by this Agreement will be deemed sufficient when received, if given in
writing by personal delivery, by certified mail, or by electronic transmission
or by fax addressed to the parties as follows, except to the extent that a
specific Annex specifies that notices with respect to matters covered in that
Annex are to be sent as provided therein:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">IF
TO DELTA:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Director - Technical Sales and Services</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Delta Air Lines, Inc.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">10</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.04%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:29.62%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.32%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Title:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="33%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:33.28%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Executive
  Vice President,<br>
  Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="22%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:22.64%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.1%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.04%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:29.62%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">11</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">ANNEX A</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">TO</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">INVENTORY SUPPORT &amp; TECHNICAL </font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">SERVICES AGREEMENT</font></i></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#RateEscalationFormulasAndAdjustments" title="Click to goto Rate Escalation Formulas and Adjustments">20.0 Rate
  Escalation Formulas and Adjustments</a></font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#YearlyRateEscalationDetermination" title="Click to goto Yearly Rate Escalation Determination">20.1 Yearly Rate
  Escalation Determination</a></font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Definitions"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DEFINITIONS</font></b></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Definitions</font></u>.&#160; The following terms have the meanings
defined below when used in this Agreement (whether or not underscored):</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.4in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>AD&#148; (Airworthiness
Directive)</u> means an airworthiness directive issued by the FAA and
applicable to any Component.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Aircraft&#148;</font></u>
means each Boeing 767-300ER aircraft that is operated by Hawaiian or lised on
its operations specifications during the Term as set forth in Section 18 of
Annex A.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#147;Allocated Inventory&#148;</font></u>&#160; means that group of Components provided from
time to time to Hawaiian by Delta to support Aircraft maintenance and operations.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>AOG&#148;
(Aircraft-on-Ground)</u> means any Aircraft which is not airworthy because of
the unavailability of one or more serviceable Common Components required for
dispatch in accordance with Hawaiian Minimum Equipment List manual.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Boeing&#148;</font></u>
means The Boeing Company or any successor or assignee corporation which is
approved by the FAA to provide maintenance, parts, and product support for the
Aircraft.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Boeing Manuals&#148;</font></u>
means the various Boeing manuals that pertain to or relate to the Aircraft or
the Components (as they may be amended, supplemented, or superseded from time
to time).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Business Day&#148;</font></u>
means any day other than a Saturday or Sunday or a holiday on which the banks
in Georgia, New York, or Hawaii are authorized or required by law to close for
business.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;<u>&#147;CLP&#148; </u>means the current list price of
a Component as defined in the most recently published original equipment
manufacturer&#146;s catalog.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Common Components</font></u>&#148;
means any Component that is then currently a Delta common component , and is
eligible for service under this Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#147;Common Station&#148;</font></u> means any
station in the continental United States at which both Hawaiian and Delta
operate B767-300ER aircraft and where Delta maintains inventory to support its
operations.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Component(s)</u>&#148;
means, collectively, any self-contained part, combination of parts,
subassemblies or units, which perform a distinctive function necessary to the
operation of a system of the Aircraft.&#160;
The following components or systems are not covered under the power by
the hour charges and are not eligible for service under this Agreement:&#160;&#160; Aircraft engines and all gas path parts for
such engines, Aircraft APU including all APU externals/accessories and all gas
path parts for such APU, landing gear (everything below the landing gear to
aircraft attachment points that is not a line replaceable unit), flight control
surfaces, thrust reversers, life limited and/or time controlled parts (shop
visits for time controlled aircraft Components are not provided as part of the
PBTH services but will be performed under Time and Material billing.&#160;&#160; Advanced exchanges for such time controlled
aircraft Components will be provided as part of the PBTH services), passenger
accommodation items (including passenger seats, and in-flight entertainment
system and components thereof), Scheduled Removal(s), wheels, tires,
brakes,&#160; Components manufactured or
assembled by either Honeywell or Collins as further defined in Appendix B, and
insurance spares identified as leaseable spare parts in the then current Boeing
Spare Parts Price Catalog.&#160; Any services
provided for such components or systems shall be performed at Delta&#146;s then
current Time and Material Rates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Delta Time &amp;
Material Rates&#148;</font></u> means Delta Time &amp; Material rates as
specified in Annex A Section 19.7.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Dollars&#148;</font></u>
and <u>&#147;$&#148;</u> means dollars in lawful currency of the United States of
America.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;FAA&#148;</font></u>
means the Federal Aviation Administration of the United States of America and
any successor agency thereto.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>FAA Regulations&#148;</u>
means all present and future laws, rules, and regulations promulgated by the
FAA and all orders issued by the FAA applicable to the Components.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Flight Hour&#148;</font></u>
means, for any particular reference period, every hour (or portion of an hour)
flown by an Aircraft, computed from each take-off (wheels off) of the Aircraft
until the subsequent landing (wheels on), as recorded in the technical log book
(or equivalent) of the applicable Aircraft</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Non-Common
Component&#148;</font></u> means any Component that is not a Common
Component.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Non-Common
Station&#148;</font></u> means any station or city outside of the continental
United States or any station at which Delta does not operate B767-300ER
aircraft or does not stock Components for support of such aircraft operation.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;OEM Manual&#148;</font></u>
means the respective manuals of each original equipment manufacturer as
applicable to their respective Components (as the manuals may be amended,
revised, supplemented, or superseded from time to time).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; &#147;Other Agreement&#148;</font></u> means
any agreement (other than this Agreement) entered into between Hawaiian and
Delta related to the maintenance or support of the Aircraft or any Aircraft
system, or related to reduced-rate travel or shipments.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#147;Parts Related Delay&#148;</font></u> means
the delay ( for more than 120 minutes) or cancellation of a scheduled Hawaiian
flight due to the unavailability of a Common Component that is also required
for dispatch as defined by the then current Hawaiian Airlines Minimum Equipment
List, at Common Stations where Delta routinely performs maintenance on the
Aircraft and at HNL.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;PBTH
(Power-by-the-Hour) Rate&#148;</font></u> means the rate defined in Annex A,
Section 19.5.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>SB&#148; (Service
Bulletin)</u> means a service bulletin issued by Boeing or the manufacturer of a
Component which recommends or provides authority for repair or modification of
a Component.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Scheduled
Removal&#148;</font></u> means the removal of a Component not due to a
confirmed or suspected failure, but brought about as a result of the Component
life having approached or achieved a previously defined limit.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Time and Material Rate&#148;
means the then-current Delta time and material rates described in Section 19.6
of this Annex A, as escalated or revised from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Undocumented
Component&#148;</font></u> means any Component that is not part of the
Allocated Inventory is not a Delta or Hawaiian purchased Component, or a
Component that was not originally delivered with the Aircraft.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='16',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Unscheduled
Removal&#148;</font></u> means any removal of a Component from an Aircraft
due to a confirmed or suspected failure of such Component.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='17',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="InventoryMaintenance">Inventory Maintenance</a>; Basis for Provisioning</font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At Common Stations where Delta routinely performs
maintenance on Aircraft and HNL, Delta will maintain an inventory of Common
Components to support the operation of the Aircraft, as described below.&#160; Delta shall provide a Common Component
supply, inventory management, and tracking function for Components, and provide
serviceable Common Components to Hawaiian on an exchange basis.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Common Components at
Common Stations shall be commingled with Delta&#146;s inventory for use on both
Delta aircraft and Hawaiian&#146;s Aircraft.&#160;
[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian is responsible
for acquiring or having access to Non-Common and non covered Component
requirements.&#160; Hawaiian may request
Delta to provide storage for such items at Common Stations.&#160; As available storage and parts handling will
be in accordance with the Hawaiian/Delta Line Maintenance Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ConfigurationManagement">Configuration Management</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta shall be responsible for the configuration
management and build standard determination for Common Components.&#160; Hawaiian shall be responsible for the
configuration management and build standard determination for Non-Common
Components.&#160; Delta shall provide
periodic, but no less than quarterly,&#160;
reports to Hawaiian for actual and proposed changes to Common Components
configuration/build standard.&#160;&#160; Hawaiian
shall be responsible for providing to Delta, in a format useable by Delta with
its most current equipment, all build standard change orders for Non-Common
Components.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ReliabilityMonitoringTracking">Reliability Monitoring &amp; Tracking</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta shall provide to Hawaiian an unscheduled removal
report for Components removed from Delta&#146;s B767-300ER aircraft.&#160; This report shall be provided no later than
the 5<sup>th</sup> business day of every month, to aid in monitoring Component
reliability trends, and failures, in order to determine any adjustment to the
Component inventory.&#160; Hawaiian shall
provide to Delta an unscheduled removal report for Components removed from
Aircraft. This report shall be provided no later than the 5<sup>th</sup>
business day of every month to aid in monitoring Component reliability trends,
and failures, in order to determine any adjustment to the Component
inventory.&#160; As available, these monthly
reports shall contain the date of removal, part number, serial number, time
since last overhaul, time since last installation, cycles since overhaul,
cycles since last installation, removal reason, failure confirmation (yes/no),
aircraft and position, and repair text.&#160;
Additionally, Delta will provide Component teardown reports to Hawaiian
as available and as and when the need arises in order to aid Hawaiian engineering
with investigating failure trends and causes. Hawaiian shall provide Delta with
a list of all the Components removed from the Aircraft for which Hawaiian does
not have repair text so that Delta can provide such information if and when it
becomes available.&#160; All such reports
will be considered Confidential Information and will be delivered in electronic
format whenever possible.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='18',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The systems to be tracked, the calculations to be made
and the performance standards against which the systems are measured will be in
accordance with FAA accepted practices. The data required to support such a
tracking program will be supplied to Delta by Hawaiian as requested by
Delta.&#160; For Components installed on
Delta aircraft, Delta intends to periodically review the reliability trend
analysis and implement corrective action if reliability falls below Delta&#146;s
established statistical limits.&#160; Delta
does not intend to track the reliability of Components while operating on Aircraft.As
available and upon reasonable request, Delta will provide reports on the
reliability of Components as experienced by Delta during the operation of such
Components on its own aircraft,&#160; listing
any corrective action undertaken by Delta.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="PerformanceMeasures">Performance Measures</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]&#160;
If either standard is not met, then Delta shall assist Hawaiian in
evaluating the cause of such failure and determine and implement the
appropriate corrective action(s) in a timely manner so as to ensure that sufficient
Common Component inventory support is made available to expeditiously correct
the Parts Related Delay rate for Aircraft. As revised from time to time,&#160; Delta will provide revised Parts Related
Delay rate goals to Hawaiian.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For Aircraft operating from Non-Common Stations, Delta
shall provide Common Component support as available,&#160; but in any case Delta intends to ship Common Components as
requested by Hawaiian within [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] of the demand as acknowledged by
Delta.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As part of the Services provided under this Agreement,
Delta shall provide repair services for Non-Common Components but shall not be
held to either a Parts Related Delay rate nor a backfill performance level for
the provisioning or availability of Non-Common Components.&#160; However, for Non-Common Component repairs,
Delta intends to manage such repair services so as to ensure a [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
rolling average turn around time of [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>].</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except in the case where
a Common Component is on order but is not available due to procurement lead
time, should the [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] rolling average Parts Related
Delay rate for Common Components at Common Stations and HNL fall below the
performance measures and should Hawaiian incur an AOG situation because of
Delta has not provided a Common Component at a Common Station or HNL, Delta
shall either, in order of preference to Delta, I) be responsible for the
documented loan charges, not including other such charges such as access
charge, availability fee, etc., actually and reasonably incurred by Hawaiian
for the loan/borrow of a Common Component to relieve an AOG situation until
such Common Component is made available to Hawaiian by Delta, or II) be
responsible, as pre-approved by Delta, for the purchase of such &#147;no-go&#148; item
but only to the extent that such purchase can relieve the AOG situation.&#160; For any such Delta approved purchase
Hawaiian shall submit a Component purchase payment notice to Delta&#146;s Hawaiian
Airlines Account Manager for crediting the purchase cost against future services
to be provided by Delta to Hawaiian under the Terms of this Agreement.&#160; Within [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] days of receipt of credit notice,
Hawaiian will forward title and all available records for the purchased
Component to Delta.&#160; In either case, if
such Component would otherwise be eligible for Services under this
Agreement,&#160; Delta will provide repair
services for such purchased Components in accordance with the Terms and
Conditions of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The remedies provided
above are the exclusive remedies offered by Delta and accepted by Hawaiian for
any failure of Delta or any Delta subcontractor to meet the performance
standards of this Agreement, and Hawaiian understands and acknowledges that the
prices and other terms hereof were agreed to and negotiated on that basis.&#160; Hawaiian has no other or additional remedy </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='19',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">against Delta or any claim for liquidated damages, whether in contract
or in tort, for the failure to meet the performance standards described above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="AdjustmentsToInventory">Adjustments to Inventory</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No less than quarterly, Delta and Hawaiian intend to
define and adjust, as mutually agreed, the type and quantity of Common
Component Inventory provisioned at Common Stations and HNL for the support of
Aircraft in order to meet the operational standards as described above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="InventoryManagement">Inventory Management</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;Delta intends
to use its inventory management system to manage, order and track Common
Components at Common Stations and HNL.&#160;
Hawaiian acknowledges that Delta may change, revise, upgrade or degrade
such system from time to time, as Delta in its sole judgment deems appropriate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="MaintenanceAndRepair">Maintenance and Repair</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta shall repair and restore both Common and
Non-Common Components removed from Aircraft that are otherwise eligible for
Services under this Agreement.&#160; Upon
return from servicing at Delta or from one of its approved maintenance
providers, each Component will have a Delta Air Lines approved return to
service tag (e.g. 8130, Pick List, Pass Parts tag) attached..&#160; After a Component has received an initial
shop visit, on second and subsequent shop visits, Delta shall bear all costs
for the replacement of all Common Components eligible for Services under this
Agreement and which are deemed beyond economic repair (BER) due to normal wear
and tear, except as provided in Section 8.0 of this Annex A.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="MisuseOrAbuseOfComponents">Misuse or Abuse of Components</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta shall repair and
replace Components damaged due to use of such Component outside of the
manufacturer&#146;s recommendations, improper operation or maintenance, foreign
object damage, abuse, negligence or accidental damage at Delta Time and
Material Rates, or if replacement is necessary, shall be replaced by Delta and
charged to Hawaiian at the Delta&#146;s purchase price or cost or the manufacturer&#146;s
then-current list price, whichever is less, plus [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] for the replacement
unit.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except when directly
attributable to Delta negligence, Delta will not be responsible under PBTH
Rates for repairs to any downstream part or system caused by failure, loss or
damage to any upstream part or system, even if the latter is covered under PBTH
Rates, and even if the failure of the former would, if not caused by the
latter, have been covered by PBTH Rates.&#160;
Hawaiian understands that any such downstream damage will be repaired by
Delta and charged to Hawaiian at Delta Time and Material Rates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="NoFaultFoundNffComponents">No Fault Found (NFF) Components</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Delta cannot confirm a
failure of a Component returned to Delta for Service under the PBTH Rate after
inspection or testing, or if such inspection or testing shows the Component to
be in serviceable condition (&#147;NFF&#148;), then: (1) Delta will advise and provide
inspection and testing results to Hawaiian; and (2) Hawaiian will pay to Delta
[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
for testing and verification of serviceability of NFF Component(s).&#160; If testing and verification of
serviceability is accomplished by a Delta vendor or subcontractor, Hawaiian
will pay to Delta, Delta&#146;s cost plus [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>].&#160;
The preceding notwithstanding, Hawaiian will not be charged an NFF fee
if the removal of the </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='20',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Component was based on a troubleshooting recommendation by Delta that
such Component be removed or if such Component was removed by Delta, unless
such Component was removed by Delta at the specific direction of Hawaiian.&#160; For Delta tested and verified NFF
Component(s), if such Component(s) is subsequently removed within [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
Flight Hours of installation with a confirmed failure for the same reason as
identified on the prior removal, then Delta will repair such Component and, in
addition, will either: (i) issue Hawaiian a credit against the unpaid Delta
invoice issued for a NFF charge, or (ii) credit to Hawaiian the amount paid by
Hawaiian for the NFF charge.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="AirworthinessDirectivesAds_">Airworthiness Directives (ADs).</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta will review, analyze and issue engineering
documentation for the accomplishment of ADs on Common Components.&#160; Hawaiian will review, analyze and issue
engineering documentation in a format acceptable to Delta with instructions for
the accomplishment of ADs on Non-Common Components. &#160;The actual accomplishment of any ADs on Components will be charged
to Hawaiian at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates, but only for the amount of such
Components deemed to be either Allocated Components, or non-complying
Components delivered with Aircraft. The amount of labor charged for
accomplishing any AD will be that number of man-hours specified in the AD, or
if the AD fails to specify the number of man-hours, then such information will
be obtained from the relevant equipment manufacturer.&#160; If the manufacturer specifies the number of man-hours, then not
