more than such number will be invoiced by Delta.&#160; If the manufacturer does not supply such information, Delta will
estimate the labor required to accomplish the AD and advise Hawaiian.&#160; Delta will track and invoice Hawaiian for
the actual labor necessary to accomplish the AD, advising of any substantive
changes, if they occur, that would significantly alter the estimate. Any labor
expended on Services not required to accomplish the AD will be allocated as
appropriate either to the PBTH Rate or to the Delta Time &amp; Material Rate as
provided elsewhere herein.&#160; The material
part of the Delta Time &amp; Material Rate charge will be for only that
material necessary to complete the AD.&#160;
If the AD fails to provide the list of materials necessary to accomplish
the AD, such information will be obtained from the relevant equipment
manufacturer.&#160; If that information is
not available, Delta will estimate the material required to accomplish the AD.
If the only reason for removing a Component from an Aircraft was to accomplish
an AD, Delta will invoice Hawaiian for, and Hawaiian will pay to Delta, all the
charges required for the Services associated with the accomplishment of the AD
and other Services required by the Maintenance Program to return the Component
to serviceable condition at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates.&#160; Any other work performed during such a shop
visit to enhance any performance or life of any Common Component will be borne
by Delta.&#160; To the extent allowed by the
time limits of the AD, Delta intends to make reasonable efforts to accomplish
ADs in conjunction with other scheduled maintenance on Components.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ServiceBulletinsSbs">Service Bulletins (SBs)</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian will review,
analyze and issue engineering documentation in a format acceptable to Delta
with instructions for the accomplishment of SBs on Non-Common Components.&#160; SBs shall be incorporated into Non-Common
Components at Hawaiian direction.&#160; For
Non-Common Components, all SBs shall be accomplished by Delta or Delta&#146;s repair
provider at then current Time and Material Rates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, during an initial
shop visit, Delta finds that the build standard for any Common Component is
below the current Delta build standard for such component, Delta will
incorporate the current Delta build standard into such component and charge
Hawaiian for such improvement(s) at Delta or repair provider T&amp;M
rates.&#160; If during an initial shop visit,
Delta finds any Common </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='21',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Component is BER, Delta will charge Hawaiian at Delta&#146;s purchase price
or cost or the manufacturer&#146;s then current list price, whichever is less, plus
[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
for the replacement of such Component.&#160;
For Common Components that have had at least one shop visit accomplished
at Delta, Delta will, as part of the Services, review, analyze and in those
instances where Delta determines it is appropriate, issue engineering
documentation for the incorporation of SBs into Common Components.&#160; For Common Components that have had at least
one shop visit accomplished under this Agreement and which require
incorporation of an SB in order to meet a Delta modification standard,&#160; such SB will be incorporated at the same
time that other services are performed on such Components, in accordance with
the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="SbsCostingNoMoreThanRedacted">SBs Costing No More Than [REDACTED]</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, after a first
qualifying shop visit, Delta reasonably estimates that the incorporation of an
SB into a Common Component will cost no more than [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>], when calculated at
applicable Delta Time &amp; Material Rates, then such SB will be incorporated
into the Component as part of the Services provided under the PBTH rate in
those instances where Delta has decided to perform such SB.&#160; For Common Components such SBs may be automatically
incorporated with or without Hawaiian permission so long as Delta advises
Hawaiian and the SB does not change the fit, form or function of the
Component.&#160; If the SB will change the
fit, form or function of the Component, then Delta will provide Hawaiian with a
written copy of Delta Engineering Order (EO) for such change. If Hawaiian
disapproves of any such SB incorporation within [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] business days after
receipt of such EO by notice to Delta, Delta will not perform the SBon any
Allocated Inventory of that part number and such Component(s) becomes a
Non-Common Component.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="SbsCostingMoreThanRedacted">SBs Costing More than [REDACTED]</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Delta reasonably
estimates that the incorporation of a SB into a Common Component will cost more
than [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>],
when calculated at applicable Delta Time &amp; Material Rates, then Delta will,
at Hawaiian&#146;s sole cost and expense for the total amount of the SB, incorporate
such SB into the Component at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates or at supplier
invoiced cost, but only for the number of such Components either deemed to be
Allocated Inventory, or Components delivered with Aircraft that do not have the
particular SB incorporated.&#160; If the
Component manufacturer or some other person compensates Delta for the
incorporation of the SB, then Hawaiian shall not be charged to the extent such
compensation reduces Delta&#146;s cost for incorporating the SB below [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>].</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="DeterminingTheCostOfSbs">Determining the Cost of SBs</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The determination of the
time and material elements of Delta Time &amp; Material Rates for incorporation
of SBs provided for above will be calculated in accordance with this
Section.&#160; The markup on materials will
be based on Delta&#146;s purchase price or cost or the manufacturer&#146;s then-current
list price, whichever is less. The labor part of the Delta Time &amp; Material
Rate charge will be only for that number of man-hours specified in the SB, or
if the SB fails to specify the number of man-hours, then such information will
be obtained from the relevant equipment manufacturer.&#160; If the manufacturer specifies the number of man-hours, then Delta
will invoice not more than such number.&#160;
If the manufacturer does not supply such information, Delta will
estimate the labor required to accomplish the SB and advise Hawaiian. Delta
shall track and invoice for the actual labor necessary to accomplish the SB,
advising of any substantive changes if they occur that would significantly
alter the estimate. The material part of the Delta Time &amp; Material Rate
charges will be for only that material necessary to complete the SB per the
information in the respective SB.&#160; If
the </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='22',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SB fails to provide the
list of material necessary for accomplishment of the SB, Delta shall obtain
such information from the appropriate equipment manufacturer.&#160; Using the bill of material specified either
in the SB or by the manufacturer, Delta will flat-rate the material for the SB
at Delta&#146;s purchase price or cost or the manufacturer&#146;s then-current list
price, whichever is less, plus [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]. If that information is not
available, Delta will estimate the material required to accomplish the SB.&#160; Delta will track and invoice Hawaiian for
the actual material necessary to accomplish the SB Labor expended on Services
not required by the accomplishment will be allocated as appropriate either to
the PBTH Rate or the Delta Time &amp; Material Rate as provided elsewhere
herein.&#160; If the only reason for removing
a Component from an Aircraft is to accomplish the performance of an SB, Delta
intends to invoice for, and Hawaiian will pay to Delta, all the costs required
for the Services associated with the accomplishment of the SB and other
Services, as determined by Delta, required to return the Component to
serviceable condition at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ModificationCompatibility">Modification Compatibility</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If Hawaiian chooses not
to accept a Common Component modification that Delta is performing on Common
Components for Delta&#146;s fleet, Hawaiian agrees to amend this Agreement to remove
such Common Component from Delta&#146;s support obligations hereunder.&#160; Such removed Component shall then be deemed
a Non-Common Component under the terms of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian is responsible
for creating, revising and maintaining current documentation and manuals to
incorporate corrections and revisions set forth in the EOs, ADs and SBs related
to Components.&#160;&#160; It is also responsible
for revising, modifying or updating any test equipment or other systems or
equipment (other than Components maintained and modified by Delta), whether
used or installed on the Aircraft or on the ground.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="UndocumentedComponentsOrRepairs">Undocumented Components or Repairs</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, in performing any Services, Delta finds any
undocumented Component or repair, then Delta will notify Hawaiian promptly,
providing documentation of the undocumented Component and/or repair.&#160; Hawaiian shall then substantiate such Component
within three (3)&#160; business days of
Delta&#146;s notice.&#160; If Hawaiian is unable
to substantiate such Component, Delta will, at its option, either not accept
the undocumented Component for Services or remedy the undocumented Component or
repair at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="SupplyResponseTimes">Supply Response Times</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">When a Component is required to be removed from an
Aircraft and Hawaiian does not have a replacement Component available, Hawaiian
will immediately advise Delta Maintenance Control Center front desk.&#160; Within thirty minutes of receiving any such
notice, Delta will: (i) acknowledge receipt of the request either by telephone,
email, or fax;&#160; (ii) advise Hawaiian
whether a replacement Component is in stock or must be obtained from another
source; and (iii) either give Hawaiian complete shipping information for the
replacement Component or advise Hawaiian when such information will become
available.&#160;&#160; Delta or its suppliers will
ship each Component to the location designated by Hawaiian as soon as possible;
but in any event, to comply with program performance measures.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta will ship Common
Components using the same degree of expediency for a Hawaiian AOG situation
that Delta generally uses for a Delta AOG situation. If Delta&#146;s general AOG
handling </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='23',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">methods are not
sufficient in a particular situation, then at Hawaiian&#146;s request, Delta will
arrange for unique shipping methods, such as the hiring of private aircraft to
ship the Common Component, all at Hawaiian&#146;s cost and expense.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ShipmentOfComponentsForServices">Shipment of Components for Services</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian will ship each Component it or its
contractors removes from an Aircraft to Delta&#146;s Technical Operations Center at
Atlanta Hartsfield Airport in Atlanta, GA within five (5) business days after
such removal.&#160; Hawaiian will handle or
arrange for all such shipments except as follows.&#160; In those instances when Delta or a Delta subcontractor removes a
Component at a Common Station within the United States, Delta will pack, ship
and track shipment of such Component.&#160;
In those instances when Delta or a Delta subcontractor removes a
Component outside the United States, Delta or its subcontractor will pack the
Component for shipment and coordinate with Hawaiian&#146;s maintenance control
center for the shipment of the Component to a service provider as designated by
Hawaiian at Hawaiian&#146;s sole cost and expense.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ShipmentMethodsAndCostsPackingReq">Shipment Methods and Costs; Packing;
Required Records</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="MethodOfShipmentAndCosts_">Method of Shipment and Costs.</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">At Hawaiian&#146;s option,
Hawaiian may provide for shipment for any Component which requires Services at
its own cost and expense via any reasonable method that will satisfy the
Component shipment time requirement set forth in Section&nbsp;14.0.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ProperPackaging_">Proper Packaging.</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta will initially
deliver all serviceable Components in reusable Category 1 containers (as
defined in ATA Specification 300).&#160;
Hawaiian will return each removed Component in the same container as the
one in which the replacement was shipped or its equivalent.&#160; If that container or its equivalent is not
returned to Delta, Hawaiian will be charged at the Delta purchase price or cost
or the manufacturer&#146;s then-current list price, whichever is less, plus [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
for its replacement or equivalent. Regardless of the method of shipment,
Hawaiian shall be responsible for ensuring that Components are properly
prepared, packaged, labeled and documented under applicable ATA 300 and IATA
dangerous goods regulations.&#160; In the
event Delta receives a Component from Hawaiian that is not properly packaged
under applicable ATA 300 and IATA dangerous goods regulations, Delta will so
notify Hawaiian in order for Hawaiian to provide a proper package for use by
Delta in returning the Component to Hawaiian.&#160;
In the event Hawaiian fails to provide the proper packaging, Delta may
provide such packaging required under the applicable ATA 300 and hazardous good
regulations and Hawaiian shall pay Delta for such packaging and other
associated costs at Delta Time &amp; Material Rates.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='24',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="RecordsAndReports_">Records and Reports.</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian will furnish the following data with each
Component offered for Services:&#160; the
registration and serial number of the Aircraft from which the Component was
removed; the Component part number, manufacturer, nomenclature, model,&#160; and serial number; the number of Flight
Hours and cycles the Component accumulated on the Aircraft; the dates the
Component was installed and removed and the reason for removal.&#160; Concurrent with shipment of serviceable
Components Delta will provide data on each such Component, including, as
available, aggregate flight hours and cycles accumulated, serial number, the
Component name, model and serial number; and the total number of hours and
cycles on the Component.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="WarrantyAdministration">Warranty Administration</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On behalf of Hawaiian, Delta will administer claims
against manufacturers of removed Components on which a warranty is in
effect.&#160; Delta will retain any warranty
related compensation.&#160; To achieve this
purpose, Hawaiian will cause the assignment to Delta of all warranty rights
related to the Components.&#160; If Hawaiian
has not made reasonable efforts for such assignment before a warranted
Component must be repaired, Hawaiian will be charged for such repair at Delta
Time and Material Rates.&#160; All
assignments of warranty rights to Delta pursuant to this Section will expire
immediately upon termination or expiration of this Agreement and such rights
will revert to Hawaiian, unless such termination is by Delta for breach by
Hawaiian, in which case such assignments will not revert to Hawaiian until
payment in full for all Services provided by Delta, and reimbursement for other
charges provided for herein, is received in full by Delta.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ProjectManagerHawaiianRepresentative">Project Manager; Hawaiian
Representatives</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta will assign an employee with experience in
project management to coordinate all aspects of the Services and to be the
primary liaison with Hawaiian during the term of the Agreement.&#160; Hawaiian will designate one or more
representatives who at all times during the term of this Agreement will have
the authority to accept or reject work performed by Delta.&#160; Hawaiian will furnish to Delta&#146;s Project
Manager a list of its personnel, with contact information, who are responsible
for the subjects covered by this Agreement.&#160;
Delta will furnish to Hawaiian a list of its personnel, with contact
information, who are responsible for the subjects covered by this Agreement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='25',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="DescriptionOfAircraft">Description of Aircraft</a></font></i></b></h2>

  <td width="10%" valign="top" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">33428</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">

  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="top" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TBD</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="10%" valign="top" bgcolor="#cceeff" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event Hawaiian adds additional aircraft to the
fleet of Aircraft , Delta reserves the right to adjust the PBTH Rates in</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">accordance with the rates listed in Annex A, Section
19, Component Repair &amp; Management - Cost per Flight Hour &amp; Rate</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Adjustment section</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">

</font>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ChargesPayments">Charges &amp; Payments</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="AllocatedInventoryFlatRate">Allocated Inventory - Flat Rate</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="CommonComponentcommonStationInventor">Common Component/Common Station
Inventory - Flat Rate</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="InventoryPurchase">Inventory Purchase</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="ComponentRepairWarrantyManagement">Component Repair &amp; Warranty
Management</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta will charge Hawaiian and Hawaiian will pay to Delta
a fixed monthly price per Aircraft Flight Hour for Component repair and
warranty administration in accordance with the rate table in Annex A Section
19.5. Within five (5) business days after the end of each calendar month,
Hawaiian will provide Delta with a report specifying, for each Aircraft by tail
number, the number of Flight Hours for such Aircraft for the preceding
month.&#160; Concurrently, Hawaiian will pay
to Delta, as specified in Section 3.2, the appropriate Power by the Hour (PBTH)
charges for such month. If there is any discrepancy in the amount of such
payment, Delta will issue an invoice or credit therefore, and it will be
resolved with the next payment due.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="PowerByTheHourRate">Power by the Hour Rate</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The PBTH rate charge during the term of this Agreement
for a particular Aircraft shall be determined by the Aircraft age table
below.&#160; The Aircraft age is defined as
the number of calendar months since the aircraft was completed as new and
available for delivery by the OEM</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta reserves the right
to amend the rates specified above in the event of unusual circumstances
related to any Aircraft. All rates shall be subject to escalation as defined in
Section 20 of this Annex.&#160;&#160; At any time
during the term of this Agreement, should the documented power by the hour
costs for all Non-Common Component repairs exceed [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]/flight hour, Delta
and Hawaiian agree to negotiate a fair and equitable increase in such rate to
address the higher than anticipated power by the hour repair costs for
Non-Common Components.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="DeltaTimeMaterialRates">Delta Time &amp; Material Rates</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:.25pt;">Delta will charge Hawaiian and
Hawaiian will pay to Delta for Services performed under Delta Time &amp;
Material Rates according to the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="LateCharges">Late Charges</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For every day beyond the fifth (5<sup>th</sup>)business
day that Hawaiian retains or fails to ship a removed Component or fails to
provide the required data for such Component, Delta will charge Hawaiian and
Hawaiian will pay to Delta a fee computed by applying a percentage to the
manufacturer&#146;s then-current list price, computed cumulatively as follows:&#160; [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] until </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='27',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian satisfies its obligation or until day 60 at
which time Delta will consider the part lost and will invoice Hawaiian for the
purchase of a replacement Component at Delta&#146;s purchase price or cost or the
manufacturer&#146;s then-current list price, whichever is less, plus a [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
administrative fee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="TimeMaterialInvoices">Time &amp; Material Invoices</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Delta intends to issue to Hawaiian at least monthly or
on a project basis, an invoice setting forth the Delta Time &amp; Material Rate
charges for Services not covered by the PBTH Rate.&#160; Such invoices will be addressed and sent to Hawaiian at the
following address:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian Airlines<br>
Attn:&#160; Accounts Payable<br>
P.O. Box 30008<br>
Honolulu, Hawaii 96820<br><br></font></p>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.0&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="RateEscalationFormulasAndAdjustments">Rate Escalation Formulas and
Adjustments</a></font></i></b></h2>

<h2 style="font-style:italic;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></h2>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <a name="YearlyRateEscalationDetermination">Yearly Rate Escalation Determination</a></font></b></h3>

<h3 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PBTH, and Delta
Time and Material Rates will all be subject to annual economic escalation
effective on the first day of January of each contract year beginning in CY
2003 (Allocated inventory and common inventory at common station lease rates
are not subject to yearly rate adjustments).&#160;
All such rates shall be adjusted at an annual escalation rate/price
adjustment as defined by the following formulate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Price Adjustments shall
be determined 90 days prior to the start of each calendar year</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For PBTH and all Flat Rates,</font></b>
the Price Adjustment (PA) will be determined according to the following
formula:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="77%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;width:77.88%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PA</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.22%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(P) x (L + M &#150; 1)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.0%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>

  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">where&#160; P</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.22%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">applicable support
  service price</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="88%" colspan="4" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:88.22%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">L</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">= Labor =</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:76.34%;">

  AHE372NS(1) for the upcoming year</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  </td>

  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:76.34%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 60.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

  <td width="72%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:72.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] x Forecasted

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">For Time and Material Labor Rates,</font></b>
the price adjustment (PA) will be determined using only the labor index
according to the following formula:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="77%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;width:77.88%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PA</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(P) x (L &#150; 1)</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.44%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">where&#160; P</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="82%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:82.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">applicable Fixed Price
  Labor Rate</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>

  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">L</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.64%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">= Labor =</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:76.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Forecasted AHE372NS(2)
  for the upcoming year</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.78%;">
  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.64%;">

  </td>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 60.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="66" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="33" style="border:none;"></td>

</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>


<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)
For purposes of the calculation, use the index forecast published in the second
calendar quarter of the year of the adjustment.&#160; Thus, for an adjustment applicable to calendar year 2006,
calculated 90 days prior to January 1, 2006, use the index published in 2<sup>nd</sup>
quarter 2005.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)
For purposes of the calculation, use the index forecast published in the second
calendar quarter of the year of the adjustment.&#160; Thus, for an adjustment applicable to calendar year 2006,
calculated 90 days prior to January 1, 2006, use the index published in 2<sup>nd</sup>
quarter 2005.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28</font></p>


<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times" style="font-family:Times;font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='28',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">where, AHE372NS is the
Average Hourly Earnings index established in Standard and Poor&#146;s Data Resources
Incorporated; PPI372NS is the Producer Price Index established in Standard and
Poor&#146;s Data Resources Incorporated; and the denominators of the equations above
are the applicable index values published for 2<sup>nd</sup> quarter of the
given calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, prior to calculation,
the U.S. Department of Labor changes the base year for determination of the AHE
or PPI values, such re-based values will be incorporated in the Price
Adjustment calculation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, prior to calculation,
the U.S. Department of Labor or Standard and Poors substantially revises the
methodology used for the determination of the index values, or for any reason
has not released values needed to determine the applicable Price Adjustment,
the parties will, prior to calculation, select a substitute for such values
from data published by Standard and Poors DRI or other similar data reported by
non-governmental United States organizations.&#160;
The substitute will lead in application to the same adjustment result,
insofar as possible, as would have been achieved by continuing the use of the
original values.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event escalation
provisions are made non-enforceable or otherwise rendered null and void by any
agency of the United States Government, the parties agree, to the extent they
may lawfully do so, to negotiate an adjustment to the prices to reflect an
allowance for increases or decreases in labor compensation and material costs.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Prior to applying index
values to dollars or rates, all index calculations shall be carried to the
nearest ten-thousandth prior to the next calculation.&#160; Any rounding of a number, as required under this clause with
respect to escalation, will be accomplished as follows: if the first digit of
the portion to be dropped from the number to be rounded is five or greater, the
preceding digit will be raised to the next higher number. &#160;Rounding will be performed at each level of
calculation prior to proceeding to the next level.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">29</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='29',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d21.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:25 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Appendix B</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Honeywell and Collins Parts
Exclusions</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Appendix C</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Common Stations</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
