In both instances <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit A</font></b> and <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit B</font></b> governs.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Program is a Card program designed for Hawaiian Airlines Customers.&#160; Under the Program, Hawaiian Airlines shall
provide Bank access to Hawaiian Airlines Customer Lists, as permitted by law
and Hawaiian Airlines&#146; contractual obligations, and limited use of Hawaiian
Airlines Marks, for use by Bank in marketing the Program to Hawaiian Airlines
Customers the Bank&#146;s customers, and the general public.&#160; Each Program Card will contain Hawaiian Airlines&#146;
and Bank&#146;s names and logos as well as other information required by Visa,
MasterCard, Bank or Hawaiian Airlines.&#160;
Bank may offer one or more Card Products as mutually agreed upon for the
Program containing the Cardholder Benefits set forth in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit A </font></b>and, if applicable,<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> Exhibit C</font></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Solicitations</font></u>.</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Hawaiian
Airlines&#146; Customer List</u>.&#160; At no cost
to Bank and at Bank&#146;s request, Hawaiian Airlines (subject to Hawaiian Airlines
privacy restrictions) will provide Bank with a list of HawaiianMiles members
who have not indicated to Hawaiian Airlines that they do not wish to have their
name disclosed to third parties (&#147;Hawaiian Airlines Customer List&#148;) in a format
satisfactory to Bank.&#160; The Hawaiian
Airlines Customer List shall include (to the extent Hawaiian Airlines has such
information) with respect to each member the name, home and business addresses,
company name, HawaiianMiles account number, enrollment date, last activity
date, tier status, market indicator, program-to-date miles, number of redeemed
miles, date of last flight, number of times flown first/business class in the
last twelve months, and email address. All Hawaiian Airlines Customer Lists
will be used at Bank&#146;s discretion only for the purpose of accomplishing
Solicitations for the credit cards to be issued pursuant to Section 3(c)
hereof.&#160; Bank will have the list
screened at its expense by a credit reporting agency to see which persons meet
Bank&#146;s credit criteria.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, Bank may have a Hawaiian Airlines
Customer List screened to determine which names and addresses are good for
offers which are not pre-approved based on sources available for this
purpose.&#160; The standards for determining
who falls into each category and which customers are eligible for an Account
shall be determined by Bank at its sole discretion exercised in accordance with
its customary standards, provided, however that Bank will always use standards
the same as those used for its other airline co-branded credit card
programs.&#160; Bank may refuse to issue a
credit card to a customer where the customer&#146;s application response or credit
history does not meet Bank&#146;s criteria as permitted by law. Bank is not
obligated, under any circumstances, to inform Hawaiian Airlines of its credit
criteria or of any credit decision.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Solicitation
Package</u>.&#160; [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Issuance
of Credit Cards to Hawaiian Airlines&#146; Customers</u>. (1) Bank shall issue
credit cards to those individuals responding to a Solicitation provided the individual
meets Bank&#146;s criteria for an Account.&#160;
Solicitations may include but not be limited to offers for the following
credit card and payment products (&#147;Card Products&#148;):</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Visa
Classic (&#147;Classic Accounts&#148;)</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Visa
Platinum (&#147;Platinum Accounts&#148;); and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Visa
Signature Card (&#147;Signature Card Accounts&#148;)</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
amounts of any finance charge, annual fee or other charge and any other
provisions of any Cardholder Agreement for any Card Product may be amended upon
notice to the cardholder, to the extent prior notice is required by law,
subject to the following conditions:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>no
such amendment shall otherwise be contrary to this Agreement;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
change to the annual percentage rate (&#147;APR&#148;), annual fee or charges for a Card
Product will be competitive with the same Card Program of other airline
co-brand credit card programs in Hawaiian Airlines&#146; markets, offered by
airlines flying to and from, or within Hawaii.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>no
change to the APR, annual fee or other charges shall become effective unless
Bank has given Hawaiian Airlines thirty (30) days advance notice of such change
and an opportunity to submit comments to Bank regarding whether the proposed
change would</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">be competitive within Hawaiian Airlines&#146; markets as
required in Section 3(c)(2)(ii); and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
change will be considered competitive for purposes of Sections 3(c)(2)(ii) and
(iii) unless the Bank determines, in good faith, that the proposed changes
would materially adversely affect the competitiveness of the portfolio.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Accounts
will be opened under the terms of Bank&#146;s cardholder agreement for the
applicable Card Product (collectively the &#147;Cardholder Agreements&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>At
no cost to Hawaiian Airlines, Bank will offer travel-related insurance and
benefits that are standard for Bank&#146;s Card Products.&#160; Bank can modify or discontinue these benefits at Bank&#146;s sole
discretion with thirty (30) days prior written notice to Hawaiian Airlines,
provided any changes to these benefits will be discussed with Hawaiian Airlines
and be competitive with other airline co-brand programs.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(5)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank
and Hawaiian Airlines will set up a process to ensure that Hawaiian Airlines
VIP&#146;s receive special review by Hawaiian Airlines and Bank marketing managers
prior to credit card denial, provided Hawaiian Airlines submits a list of
Hawaiian Airlines&#146; VIPs to Bank and the VIPs are creditworthy.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d) </font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Cost
of Solicitations</u>.&#160; Bank shall bear
all the costs of the Solicitation pursuant to this Section 3, including without
limitation, costs of preparation and printing of the Solicitation material,
postage and handling, and costs of any services rendered by a mail-order house
or fulfillment house; and all other processing, evaluating, screening, or
handling costs and expenses.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Credit
Card Design</u>.&#160; Bank will provide
Hawaiian Airlines the necessary Visa design specifications for custom graphics
of the Hawaiian Airlines co-brand card.&#160;
Bank will use its authorized vendor for the production of the custom
Hawaiian Airlines co-brand card.&#160; There
will be no cost to Hawaiian Airlines in connection with the design,
preparation, production and issuance of the credit cards issued hereunder.
Subject to satisfaction of Visa regulations, and Bank&#146;s requirements, Hawaiian
Airlines will have the right to approve the design of all the cards.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>  <b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Marketing</font></u>.</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>The
Bank&#146;s Other Relationships</u>. Hawaiian Airlines acknowledges that the Bank
may have existing relationships, or may develop future relationships, with
persons appearing on Hawaiian Airlines Customer Lists which Hawaiian Airlines
provides according to Section 3 above.&#160;
Except as provided herein, this Agreement will not restrict or in any
manner affect Bank&#146;s dealings with those persons, except with respect to
Solicitations directly using Hawaiian Airlines Customer Lists.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Strategies</u>.&#160; The parties will define marketing strategies
and responsibilities on an ongoing basis.&#160;
Either party may propose marketing strategies or plans, and the other
party will review them and respond by not later than 30 days following receipt
of the proposal.&#160; The parties may amend
this Agreement to add mutually agreeable requirements for marketing strategies
and plans.&#160; At a minimum, Bank and
Hawaiian Airlines will meet at least once each calendar year to jointly develop
a marketing plan for the following calendar year.&#160; The marketing plan will include goals for Hawaiian Airlines
Portfolio growth.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Marketing
Activity</u>.&#160; Each party will provide
to the other party, for its review and approval, any offer, promotional or
other material relating to the Program.&#160;
The material will not be used before the other party&#146;s prior approval,
which will not be unreasonably withheld.&#160;
Marketing activity will include, without limitation, the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Statement
Inserts</u>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(A) <u>Program</u>.&#160;
Hawaiian Airlines may advertise and promote products and services sold
by Hawaiian Airlines, its affiliates or marketing partners in the Hawaiian
Airlines Portfolio billing statements in accordance with a schedule to be
mutually agreed upon by Hawaiian Airlines and Bank, and at no cost to Hawaiian
Airlines except for the production cost to produce the statement inserts and
deliver the statement inserts to Bank or Bank&#146;s fulfillment vendor.&#160; The contents of the insert shall be subject
to review and approval by Bank, which approval shall not be unreasonably
withheld. Hawaiian Airlines shall inform Bank of its desire to mail such an
insert no less than ninety (90) days prior to the desired mail start date.&#160; Hawaiian Airlines will produce all statement
inserts in accordance with Bank specifications and will be responsible for any
increase in postage due to weight in excess of envelop allowance, provided that
Bank gives Hawaiian Airlines advance notice of increase postage costs prior to
printing. Bank shall make available to Hawaiian Airlines for such solicitation
purposes, a maximum of 5 statement insert slots in all Accounts, per month,
provided, however that Bank reserves the right to use one or more of the insert
slots as needed for required operational, regulatory or legal notifications.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(B) <u>HawaiianMiles</u>.&#160; During each Contract Year Hawaiian Airlines will allow Bank to
insert advertising and promotion materials into the HawaiianMiles mileage
statement a minimum of four times annually, at no cost to Bank except for the
production cost to produce the statement inserts and deliver the statement
inserts to Hawaiian Airlines or Hawaiian Airlines&#146; fulfillment vendor. Bank
will be responsible for any increase in postage due to weight in excess of
envelop allowance, provided that Hawaiian Airlines gives Bank advance notice of
increase postage costs prior to printing. The contents of the statement insert
shall be subject to review and approval by Hawaiian Airlines, which approval
shall not be unreasonably withheld. Bank shall inform Hawaiian Airlines of its
desire to mail such insert no less than ninety (90) days prior to the desired
mail start date.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(C) <u>Contents of Statement</u>.&#160; The contents of billing statements and any
Bank inserts mailed with the statement shall be under the exclusive control of
Bank, provided that Hawaiian Airlines shall be entitled to review and approve
any inserts or non-bill related contents of statements prior to mailing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(D) <u>Notice and Approval</u>.&#160; With respect to the use of the insert slots
provided for in this Section, Hawaiian Airlines shall provide Bank with a
description of any product or service which it intends to offer three (3)
months prior to such proposed offering and shall obtain Bank&#146;s prior written
consent to the type of product or service to be offered prior to printing,
which consent will not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Hawaiian
Airlines Cross Sell Opportunities.</u>&#160;
Bank shall make Bank&#146;s communication channels available to Hawaiian
Airlines for the purpose of advertising or promoting its products or services.
Bank will advise Hawaiian Airlines of production cost and other charges, if
applicable, associated with each communication channels at time of scheduling.
Such promotions must offer Bank customers a special value or benefit and is
subject to the prior written approval of Bank (not to be unreasonably
withheld). Communication channels available to Hawaiian Airlines may include:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Statement inserts non co-brand credit card and debit
card</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Direct Mail non
co-branded credit card and debit card</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Statement Messaging non
co-brand credit card and debit card</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ATM receipts and screens
(potentially with transaction fees)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Banking center promotion</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Website advertising</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">VRU / Call Center</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Loan Statements</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Checking Statements</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Card Carriers</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">New Account Kits</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Promotional
Materials</u>.&#160; From time to time, Bank
and Hawaiian Airlines may agree to insert promotional materials into each
other&#146;s statements.&#160; Bank Statements are
defined as cardholder statements excluding current co-brand portfolios and
Hawaiian Airlines statements are HawaiianMiles member statements.&#160; Bank and Hawaiian Airlines will jointly
agree upon the size and content of the inserts.&#160; Each will bear its own cost to print and deliver the inserts.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>  <u>Solicitations</u>.&#160; Bank will develop all Solicitation packages
and Hawaiian Airlines will have an opportunity to review such Solicitation
packages pursuant to the approval rights set forth in Section 4(d) of this
Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Advertising
Media</u>.&#160; Bank and Hawaiian Airlines
will jointly discuss and agree upon all applicable advertising media, i.e.
Hawaiian Airlines channels, Bank channels and other broadcast and direct mail
vehicles.&#160; Notwithstanding the
foregoing, during each Contract Year Hawaiian Airlines will allow Bank one
article in each issue of the In-flight magazine, an article in each general
membership newsletter and as appropriate each elite member newsletter, and use
one or more of their other advertising channels either separately or
concurrently including but not limited to, electronic messages, statement
inserts and/or messages, ticket jackets, airport kiosks and in-flight video
announcements. Bank shall be responsible for production of the above referenced
advertising media.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Take-Ones.</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank will develop and provide at no cost to Hawaiian
Airlines &#147;Take-One&#148; applications and display materials that will carry the
Hawaiian Airlines graphics.&#160; Such
materials shall be dedicated exclusively to Hawaiian Airlines. Hawaiian
Airlines shall display such applications at select locations mutually agreed by
Hawaiian Airlines and Bank, as permitted by airport regulations and other
contractual agreements, and include one with each new HawaiianMiles new member
kit mailings.&#160; Bank shall provide branch
exposure in relevant markets consistent with Bank&#146;s other airline card products
marketed in the United States.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 103.5pt;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Internet</u>.&#160; Bank and Hawaiian Airlines each at its own
expense shall promote the Program on its respective web site.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Other</u>.&#160; Bank and Hawaiian Airlines will mutually
agree on other marketing activities.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Transaction
Information</u>.&#160; From time to time
Hawaiian Airlines and Bank shall provide, at the expense of the provider,
information relating to Mutual Customers to assist the marketing efforts of the
other party.&#160; Such information may include,
for example, information from Bank relating to purchases of travel on Hawaiian
Airlines&#146; competitors, or information from Hawaiian Airlines relating to
purchases made with credit cards issued by creditors other than Bank.&#160; Neither party shall be required to provide
any information if in the provider&#146;s reasonable opinion, the disclosure of such
information would violate any law, its internal policy or agreement to which it
is bound or otherwise subjects the provider to liability.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Approval
Rights</u>.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
marketing activity materials produced or used by Bank that advertises the
HawaiianMiles Program, solicits an application for a HawaiianMiles Program Card
usage, and that also contains Hawaiian Airlines name or logo shall be subject
to prior written approval by Hawaiian Airlines before the materials are used by
the Bank.&#160; Any marketing activity
materials produced by Hawaiian Airlines that solicits an application or
encourages the HawaiianMiles Program Card usage, or that contains Bank&#146;s name
or logo, shall be subject to prior written approval by Bank before the
materials may be used by Hawaiian Airlines.&#160;
Each party&#146;s right to either require changes or to refuse to approve any
marketing activity materials shall be limited to the following reasons:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
manner in which the party&#146;s trade name or logo is used;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
inaccuracy of the information;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
information is inconsistent with the corporate policy of or tends to injure the
corporate image of the reviewing party; or</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
materials would create a possibility of violating or actually violate a law or
existing agreement to which the party is subject</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Each
party shall have ten (10) business days to review the initial draft and ten
(10) business days to review the final draft of any marketing activity
materials received from the other party.&#160;
Delivery of comments, changes or approvals must be communicated in
writing by e-mail, facsimile, or mail between</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">employees of each party who are dedicated to the
HawaiianMiles Program.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e) <u>Marketing
Commitment.</u>&#160; During the Initial Term
of this Agreement, Bank shall spend a minimum of [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] (the &#147;Marketing Commitment&#148;) or such greater amount
as it shall determine in its sole discretion toward marketing the Program,
including but not limited to Solicitations. Bank shall determine in its sole
discretion when and how the Marketing Commitment shall be spent.&#160; However in no case will the Bank use the Marketing
Commitment to offset fixed and customary overhead expense. The Marketing
Commitment amount is exclusive of any credit card association financial or
marketing consideration.&#160; Within thirty
(30) days after the end of each Contract Year, Bank shall submit to Hawaiian
Airlines reasonable evidence of the costs and expenses paid by Bank for the
marketing of the Program.<u>  </u></font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Proprietary
Information; Confidentiality</font></u></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Hawaiian
Airlines</u>.&#160; Bank acknowledges and
agrees that Hawaiian Airlines has a proprietary interest in the Hawaiian Airlines
Customer Lists.&#160; All such information
shall be referred to herein as &#147;Hawaiian Airlines Proprietary Information.&#148;
Bank will keep the Hawaiian Airlines Proprietary Information confidential, and
prevent Bank&#146;s employees, agents and contractors from divulging Proprietary
Information or from using such Proprietary Information for any purpose not
herein contemplated.&#160; Except as
otherwise provided below, Bank shall use Hawaiian Airlines Proprietary
Information only for purposes of the Solicitations and in connection with the
opening and administration of Accounts and issuance of cards as a result of the
Solicitations, and will not sell, rent, or otherwise make available Hawaiian
Airlines Proprietary Information to any third party for the third party&#146;s marketing
purposes without the expressed written consent of Hawaiian Airlines.&#160; Lists of Bank accountholders, obtained as a
result of the Solicitations, shall not be considered a part of Hawaiian
Airlines Proprietary Information and may be used for any purpose Bank wishes.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Bank</u>.&#160; Hawaiian Airlines acknowledges and agrees
that Bank claims a proprietary interest in (i) Bank&#146;s customer lists and any
information concerning those customers and their credit card or other
relationships with Bank and (ii) the terms of this Agreement.&#160; All such information shall be referred to
herein as &#147;Bank&#146;s Proprietary Information.&#148;&#160;
Hawaiian Airlines will keep Bank&#146;s Proprietary Information confidential,
and prevent its agents and contractors from divulging Bank&#146;s Proprietary Information.&#160; Hawaiian Airlines will not use any of Bank&#146;s
Proprietary Information that comes into its possession through any manner
including, but not limited to marketing reports, transaction reports, monthly</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">marketing meetings except in connection with its
obligations under this Agreement.&#160;
Hawaiian Airlines Customer Lists obtained pursuant to the Solicitations
shall not be considered Bank&#146;s Proprietary Information, provided, however, that
Hawaiian Airlines may not use the subset of such Hawaiian Airlines Customer
List that constitutes Bank&#146;s customer list for any reason except in connection
with its obligations under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Not
Guarantors</u>.&#160; Neither party will be
considered a guarantor of the actions of any third party. Either party may
disclose the Proprietary Information of the other party to regulatory
authorities and government agencies where required to do so by such authority
or agency.&#160; If one party learns of any
unauthorized disclosure or use of the other party&#146;s Proprietary Information, it
will promptly notify the other party.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Duty
to Keep Customer Information Confidential</u>.&#160;
Bank and Hawaiian Airlines acknowledge that each has a responsibility to
its customers to keep information about its customers and their accounts
(&#147;Customer Information&#148;) strictly confidential.&#160; In addition to the other requirements set forth in this Paragraph
regarding Proprietary and Confidential Information, Customer Information shall
also be subject to the additional restrictions set forth in this
Subparagraph.&#160; Neither Bank nor Hawaiian
Airlines shall disclose or use any Customer Information other than on a &#147;need
to know&#148; basis to carry out the purposes of this Agreement (and in accordance
with an express direction given by such customers as to the use of their data)
and then only to: (i) affiliates of Bank or Hawaiian Airlines, (ii) Hawaiian
Airlines and Bank&#146;s employees or officers, (iii) to carefully selected
subcontractors provided that such subcontractors shall have entered into a
confidentiality agreement no less restrictive than the terms hereof; (iv) to
independent contractors, agents and consultants designated by Bank or Hawaiian
Airlines, as applicable; or (v) pursuant to the exceptions set forth in 15 USC
6802(e) or accompanying regulations which disclosures are made in the ordinary
course of business.&#160; The restrictions
set forth herein shall apply during the Term and after the termination of this
Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Cooperation
on Solicitations</font></u>.</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian Airlines and Bank will use all reasonable
efforts to cooperate in assuring the integrity, accuracy, and security of the
solicitation process for each Solicitation pursuant to this Agreement; however,
Bank shall remain solely responsible for ensuring that such Solicitations do
not violate any law or result in any other liability of any nature applicable
to credit card Solicitations.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, Hawaiian Airlines shall remain solely responsible
for ensuring that the rules of the HawaiianMiles program, as such relates to
the</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Accounts, are fully and accurately disclosed. Hawaiian
Airlines and Bank shall cooperate in the development of Bank&#146;s solicitation
plans.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>  <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Program
Management.</font></b>&#160; </u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a) </font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Staffing</u>.&#160; The parties shall each designate qualified
employees to work on the Program, to properly implement and perform their
respective duties and obligations under this Agreement in a timely and
efficient manner. Each party shall notify the other party of such employee
designations and their respective addresses and phone numbers.&#160; Each party will notify the other of any
changes to such information within 48 hours of any such change.<u>  </u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) Primary responsibility for managing the growth and
development of the Hawaiian Airlines Portfolio will be:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Manager Partner Marketing</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian Airlines</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3375 Koapaka Street, Suite G350</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Honolulu, Hawaii 96819</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bank of America</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Hawaiian Airlines Portfolio Manager</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Performance
Review</u>.&#160; Bank and Hawaiian Airlines
shall use commercially reasonable efforts to hold at least one (1) performance
review meeting each month to discuss portfolio performance and marketing
initiatives.&#160; The parties shall agree to
the time and place of each meeting.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Annual
Planning Meeting</u>.&#160; The parties shall
meet annually at a mutually agreed upon location for the purpose of discussing
the Program and planning for future marketing and growth. The parties will work
in good faith to agree on an annual marketing plan by October 31 of each year
during this Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Air
Transportation</u>.&#160; Hawaiian Airlines
shall provide air transportation to the performance review and annual planning
meetings in the form of up to twelve (12) airline tickets annually, if the
meetings are held in locations served by Hawaiian Airlines. Other than the air
transportation as described in the preceding sentence, each party shall bear
its own expense related to such meetings.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION 8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u><font style="font-weight:bold;">Payments and Revenue Share</font></u></b>.
</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Advance</u>.&#160; Bank will pay Hawaiian Airlines an advance
against Hawaiian Airlines revenue share as set forth in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix A</font></b> or <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix B</font></b>,
as</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">applicable, of [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
within five (5) business days of the Effective Date of this Agreement (the
&#147;Advance Payment&#148;).&#160; The Advance Payment
of revenue share is being made against the Revenue Commitment described in
Section 8(b) of this Agreement until the revenue share generated by the Program
equals or exceeds the amount of the Advance Payment as set forth in Section
8(e).&#160;&#160; If this Agreement is terminated
by Hawaiian Airlines for any reason or by Bank for cause or if any of the
conditions stated in Section 8(c) shall no longer be satisfied before the Program
has generated revenue in excess of the Advance Payment, then Hawaiian Airlines,
or its successor, shall pay the Bank the unearned amount against the Advance
Payment (the Advance Payment minus the earned and recouped revenue share).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Hawaiian
Airlines may enter into one or more stock repurchase programs prior to the full
recoupment of the Advance Payment provided that (i) the amount of cash utilized
for any such stock repurchase shall not exceed [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] of the cash and cash equivalents held by Hawaiian
Airlines at the time of the stock repurchase and (ii) the cash and cash
equivalents held by Hawaiian Airlines immediately after any such stock
repurchase shall not be less than [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>].
Additionally, Hawaiian Airlines will notify<u>  </u>the Bank at least two (2)
weeks prior to initiating a stock repurchase program prior to the full
recoupment of the Advance Payment.&#160; In
the event that such stock repurchase exceeds [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
of cash and cash equivalents or reduces cash and cash equivalents to less than
[<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] then: (i) any portion
of the Advance Payment that has not been earned and recouped shall be
immediately repayable to Bank as of the stock repurchase offering date, and
(ii) Bank shall have no further obligation to make payments pursuant to Section
4(e) and Section 8(b).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Revenue Commitment.</u>&#160; During the term of this Agreement Bank shall
pay Hawaiian Airlines a minimum of [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
as set forth in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix A </font></b>or<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> Appendix B</font></b>, as applicable<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">, </font></b>which
includes the [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>] Advance
Payment.&#160; The Revenue Commitment amount
may increase to a maximum of [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]
as set forth in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix A </font></b>or<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> Appendix B, </font></b>as<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>applicable.&#160; The Revenue Commitment amount is the
aggregate of all payments by the Bank for miles at the Base Rate, Bonus Rate,
and bounty payments as set forth on <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit B, </font></b>and<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>any new product or services
offered pursuant to Section 10(c) of this Agreement.&#160; The amount of the Revenue Share shall begin to accumulate on the
Effective Date of this Agreement.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>In
the event that the number of HawaiianMiles Active Members who are under
eighteen years of age exceeds [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>],
Hawaiian Airlines and Bank agree that the Commitment as stated in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix A</font></b>
or <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix
B</font></b> for the applicable Contract Year, other than the first Contract
Year, shall be adjusted using the Minor Adjustment Formula in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Appendix A </font></b>or<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> Appendix B</font></b>.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Notwithstanding
the provisions of Section 4(e), Section 8(a), except as provided in therein,
and Section 8(b) the payment of the Marketing Commitment, Advance Payment and Revenue
Commitment shall be made only if all of the following conditions, to the extent
applicable in each particular case, are fully satisfied at the time of
Effective Date of this Agreement and at the time payment is payable:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Hawaiian
Airlines continues to maintain and offer membership in its HawaiianMiles
frequent flyer program and that program remains competitive within the airline
industry;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
HawaiianMiles thirty-six (36) month membership base as of the Effective Date is
at or above [<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">REDACTED</font></b>]</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>There
is no material deterioration to Hawaiian Airlines&#146; financial condition;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>There
is no sale or change in control of Hawaiian Airlines;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Hawaiian
Airlines is not in default of any agreement to which it is a party;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank
is allowed full access to HawaiianMiles membership lists and access to member
communications for card solicitation purposes in accordance with legal
requirements, and privacy policies;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Bank has an opportunity to market through other Hawaiian Airlines customer
channels, as appropriate, feasible and consistent with government regulation;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank is
granted use of Hawaiian Airlines and HawaiianMiles trademarks, trade names and
logos to market the program to Hawaiian Airlines customers and the general
public;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Promotion
of the Program on Hawaiian Airlines and HawaiianMiles websites;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(x)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank
having access to, and contact with Hawaiian Airlines database management group;
and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>A
designated contact person, with decision authority, to administer the daily operations
and marketing details of the Program.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\C2\rcheney\8424_10\t_1390443\j8424_ex10d24.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Apr 15 12:27 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d) </font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Excise
Tax</u>.&#160; Bank shall pay to Hawaiian
Airlines all taxes, surcharges or duties or other charges of a similar nature
payable in connection with the amounts due under this Agreement, including,
without limitation, the 7.5%, or applicable percentage amount, transportation
tax payable in connection with the purchase of miles (the &#147;Transportation
Excise Tax&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Payment
Calculation</u>.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Bank will calculate
payments due to Hawaiian Airlines under this Agreement for each calendar month
